title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
The response should include supporting work for the numerical answer of 3.5.

Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include the value of the integral.
The student response accurately includes the value of the integral.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Answers without supporting work do not earn any points.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
The evaluation of the definite integrals is assessed in the second point.

Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
